topic.title: Moving/Renaming RNG Resources
topic.shortdesc: You are able to move and rename a resource presented in the Resource/Hierarchy Dependencies view, using the Rename resource and Move resource refactoring actions from the contextual menu.

body.p: In case the Update references of the moved resource(s) option is enabled, a Preview option which opens the Preview dialog is available for both actions. The Preview dialog presents a list with the resources that are updated.
body.note: Updating the references of a resource that is resolved through a catalog is not supported. Also, the update references operation is not supported in case the path to the renamed or moved resource contains entities.
